chart.title: RENTABILIDADE DO KIT
chart.expression: SELECT SUM(ISNULL(ICP.AD_VLRVENDA,0)) AS VLRVENDA, SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM.GRUPOICMS IN (1,2) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.18,2) END) AS VLRICMS, SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM.GRUPOPIS = 'ISENTO' THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.0065,2) END) AS VLRPIS, SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM.GRUPOCOFINS = 'ISENTO' THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.03,2) END) AS VLRCOFINS, SUM(ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.15,2)) AS DEDUCOES, SUM(round(sankhya.PRECODECUSTO(icp.codmatprima, icp.codvol),2)) as CUSTO FROM sankhya.TGFICP ICP INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO ITEM ON ITEM.CODPROD = ICP.CODMATPRIMA WHERE ICP.CODPROD = :CODPROD

fat.expression: SELECT SUM(ISNULL(ICP.AD_VLRVENDA,0)) AS VLRVENDA FROM sankhya.TGFICP ICP INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO ITEM ON ITEM.CODPROD = ICP.CODMATPRIMA WHERE ICP.CODPROD = :CODPROD

cmv.expression: SELECT SUM(round(sankhya.PRECODECUSTO(icp.codmatprima, icp.codvol),2)) as CUSTO FROM sankhya.TGFICP ICP INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO ITEM ON ITEM.CODPROD = ICP.CODMATPRIMA WHERE ICP.CODPROD = :CODPROD

gv.expression: SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN ITEM.GRUPOICMS IN (1,2) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.18,2) END + CASE WHEN ITEM.GRUPOPIS = 'ISENTO' THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.0065,2) END + CASE WHEN ITEM.GRUPOCOFINS = 'ISENTO' THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.03,2) END),2) AS IMPOSTOS FROM sankhya.TGFICP ICP INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO ITEM ON ITEM.CODPROD = ICP.CODMATPRIMA WHERE ICP.CODPROD = :codprod

gf.expression: SELECT SUM(ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.15,2)) AS DEDUCOES FROM sankhya.TGFICP ICP INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO ITEM ON ITEM.CODPROD = ICP.CODMATPRIMA WHERE ICP.CODPROD = :CODPROD

resultado.expression: SELECT SUM( ISNULL(ICP.AD_VLRVENDA,0) - CASE WHEN ITEM.GRUPOICMS IN (1,2) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.18,2) END - CASE WHEN ITEM.GRUPOPIS = 'ISENTO' THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.0065,2) END - CASE WHEN ITEM.GRUPOCOFINS = 'ISENTO' THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.03,2) END - ROUND(ISNULL(AD_VLRVENDA,0)*0.15,2)) - round(sankhya.PRECODECUSTO(icp.codmatprima, icp.codvol),2))) FROM sankhya.TGFICP ICP INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO ITEM ON ITEM.CODPROD = ICP.CODMATPRIMA WHERE ICP.CODPROD = :CODPROD
